summary: Jewelry e-commerce platform with 22K/18K/9K Gold categories, running banner for Lab Grown Diamonds, admin panel for product/inventory/order management and carousel control, Google Pay UPI integration, and homepage carousel with admin-uploaded images
architectural_notes: E-commerce platform for jewelry with product categorization by gold karat
Admin panel for full product lifecycle management
Google Pay UPI payment integration required
Homepage carousel system with admin upload capability

existing_features.title: Implement three product categories: 22K Gold, 18K Gold, and 9K Gold. Update the product catalog data model to support these categories and ensure all product management flows use these categories.
Add a running banner positioned directly below the header that displays 'Lab Grown Diamonds' content. The banner should be visible on all pages and use the site's metallic gold styling theme.

Enhance admin panel to include full product management (add/edit/delete products), inventory management capabilities, order viewing functionality, and carousel management with URL configuration for each carousel item.
Integrate Google Pay UPI for checkout and payment processing. Replace or enhance existing payment flow to support UPI-based transactions through Google Pay.

Create a homepage carousel positioned in the body section that displays images uploaded and managed through the admin control panel. The carousel should support multiple images with navigation controls.

Match the design styling from the Aurelie Fine Jewellery reference site (https://aurelie-fine-jewellery-wgl.caffeine.xyz/admin) including header layout, footer layout, and background color scheme throughout the application.

new_feature_requests.summary: Running banner below header with 'Lab Grown Diamonds' content
Admin panel: add/edit/delete products, manage inventory, view orders
Admin control: add/edit carousel with URL configuration
Google Pay UPI integration for checkout and payment
Homepage carousel displaying admin-uploaded images in body section
Design matching Aurelie Fine Jewellery reference (header, footer, background color)
